column4: Desktop Effects could not be Enabled upgrade to 7.10.... any idea how to fix this?
not sure, I know its nvid based w/ 128mb ram
open a terminal and run compiz --replace
if not, pastebin the output (use pastebin.com or similar)
ok that's fixable (at least it should be)
save and close, then try compiz --replace again
I told you what the problem is, I just don't know why the solution didn't work :/
